title: Shadows Fall - Forevermore EP
description:
For the first time in lossless quality is this rare 2007 promo EP by metal act "Shadows Fall" for their "Threads of Life" album.



The entire EP was ripped in EAC and encoded in FLAC lossless quality for maximum enjoyment of the uploader/downloaders.




Forevermore was taken from the "Threads of Life" album released in 2007.

Stupid Crazy was on some pressings of the "Threads of Life" album as a bonus track but is more commonly found on the "Resident Evil: Extinction" soundtrack album.


The live rehearsals on this disc can also be found on the iTunes bonus tracks version of "Threads of Life"
